verses.roman:
abhivandyātha rājānaṁ
bhīmārjuna-janārdanāḥ
sarvam āśrāvayāṁ cakrur
ātmanā yad anuṣṭhitam

synonyms: abhivandya—offering their respects; atha—then; rājānam—the King; bhīma-arjuna-janārdanāḥ—Bhīma, Arjuna and Kṛṣṇa; sarvam—everything; āśrāvayām cakruḥ—they told; ātmanā—by themselves; yat—what; anuṣṭhitam—executed.
translation: Bhīma, Arjuna and Janārdana offered their respects to the King and informed him fully about what they had done.
